subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Devils were infuriated with Sean Avery when he stationed himself in front of Martin Brodeur in Game 3 and obscured his vision, even though they knew there was no rule against what he did.
snippet: The Devils were infuriated with Sean Avery when he stationed himself in front of Martin Brodeur in Game 3 and obscured his vision, even though they knew there was no rule against what he did.
